Title: Experimental evaluation of phase noise tolerance for polarization-insensitive coherent receiver
Abstract: The phase noise tolerance of a polarization-insensitive coherent receiver was experimentally assessed using Alamouti-coded OFDM signals. For a LO laser linewidth of 1 MHz, a sensitivity penalty of just 0.6 dB was observed for 10.7 Gb/s OFDM-QPSK.
